response.overview: Anima, the term for soul, for the metaphysical element in us that revolves around beauty, accuracy, aesthetics and the meaning of existence. André Heller takes this timeless symbol and shapes it into one of the most beautiful gardens in the world. André Heller, who describes himself as a “manic manifester of realities,” provides deep insights into his understanding of spirituality and why he believes it is essential to “create places where we can get to the bottom of ourselves and the world.” ANIMA - THE RETURN TO PARADISE focuses on the personal backgrounds that make such an exceptional project possible and encounters motifs that not only underline what has been said, but also carry it far beyond the pure level of meaning. An undistracted, powerful stream of images,
response.title: ANIMA - André Heller´s Paradiesgarten
